33 namespace voxblox {

35 namespace timing {
36 
37 template <typename T, typename Total, int N>
38 class Accumulator {
39  public:
40  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
41 
42  Accumulator()
43  : window_samples_(0),
44  totalsamples_(0),
45  window_sum_(0),
46  sum_(0),
47  min_(std::numeric_limits<T>::max()),
48  max_(std::numeric_limits<T>::min()) {}
49 
50  void Add(T sample) {
51  if (window_samples_ < N) {
52  samples_[window_samples_++] = sample;
53  window_sum_ += sample;
54  } else {
55  T& oldest = samples_[window_samples_++ % N];
56  window_sum_ += sample - oldest;
57  oldest = sample;
58  }
59  sum_ += sample;
60  ++totalsamples_;
61  if (sample > max_) {
62  max_ = sample;
63  }
64  if (sample < min_) {
65  min_ = sample;
66  }
67  }
68 
69  int TotalSamples() const { return totalsamples_; }
70 
71  double Sum() const { return sum_; }
72 
73  double Mean() const { return sum_ / totalsamples_; }
74 
75  double RollingMean() const {
76  return window_sum_ / std::min(window_samples_, N);
77  }
78 
79  double Max() const { return max_; }
80 
81  double Min() const { return min_; }
82 
83  double LazyVariance() const {
84  if (window_samples_ == 0) {
85  return 0.0;
86  }
87  double var = 0;
88  double mean = RollingMean();
89  for (int i = 0; i < std::min(window_samples_, N); ++i) {
90  var += (samples_[i] - mean) * (samples_[i] - mean);
91  }
92  var /= std::min(window_samples_, N);
93  return var;
94  }
95 
96  private:
97  int window_samples_;
98  int totalsamples_;
99  Total window_sum_;
100  Total sum_;
101  T min_;
102  T max_;
103  T samples_[N];
104 };
105 
106 struct TimerMapValue {
107  TimerMapValue() {}
108 
109  // Create an accumulator with specified window size.
110  Accumulator<double, double, 50> acc_;
111 };
112 
113 // A class that has the timer interface but does nothing. Swapping this in in
114 // place of the Timer class (say with a typedef) should allow one to disable
115 // timing. Because all of the functions are inline, they should just disappear.
116 class DummyTimer {
117  public:
118  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
119 
120  explicit DummyTimer(size_t /*handle*/, bool /*constructStopped*/ = false) {}
121  explicit DummyTimer(std::string const& /*tag*/,
122  bool /*constructStopped*/ = false) {}
123  ~DummyTimer() {}
124 
125  void Start() {}
126  void Stop() {}
127  bool IsTiming() { return false; }
128 };
129 
130 class Timer {
131  public:
132  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
133 
134  Timer(size_t handle, bool constructStopped = false);
135  Timer(std::string const& tag, bool constructStopped = false);
136  ~Timer();
137 
138  void Start();
139  void Stop();
140  bool IsTiming() const;
141 
142  private:
143  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::system_clock> time_;
144 
145  bool timing_;
146  size_t handle_;
147 };
148 
149 class Timing {
150  public:
151  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
152 
153  typedef std::map<std::string, size_t> map_t;
154  friend class Timer;
155  // Definition of static functions to query the timers.
156  static size_t GetHandle(std::string const& tag);
157  static std::string GetTag(size_t handle);
158  static double GetTotalSeconds(size_t handle);
159  static double GetTotalSeconds(std::string const& tag);
160  static double GetMeanSeconds(size_t handle);
161  static double GetMeanSeconds(std::string const& tag);
162  static size_t GetNumSamples(size_t handle);
163  static size_t GetNumSamples(std::string const& tag);
164  static double GetVarianceSeconds(size_t handle);
165  static double GetVarianceSeconds(std::string const& tag);
166  static double GetMinSeconds(size_t handle);
167  static double GetMinSeconds(std::string const& tag);
168  static double GetMaxSeconds(size_t handle);
169  static double GetMaxSeconds(std::string const& tag);
170  static double GetHz(size_t handle);
171  static double GetHz(std::string const& tag);
172  static void Print(std::ostream& out);
173  static std::string Print();
174  static std::string SecondsToTimeString(double seconds);
175  static void Reset();
176  static const map_t& GetTimers() { return Instance().tagMap_; }
177 
178  private:
179  void AddTime(size_t handle, double seconds);
180 
181  static Timing& Instance();
182 
183  Timing();
184  ~Timing();
185 
186  typedef AlignedVector<TimerMapValue> list_t;
187 
188  list_t timers_;
189  map_t tagMap_;
190  size_t maxTagLength_;
191  std::mutex mutex_;
192 };
